General.Name: Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited
General.Description: Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited engages in the investment and real estate businesses in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Investment in Consumer Products Business; Investment in Food and Beverage Business; and Industrial Park Development and Investment in Other Businesses. The company engages in the development of service apartments and buildings; and buying, selling, and leasing of real estate properties. It also invests in consumer products, such as textile and fashion, household, beauty and cosmetics, and other consumer products; and food and beverages, which include instant noodles and semi-finished foods, and bread and bakery products. In addition, the company is involved in the development and operation of four industrial parks in Si Racha District, Chonburi Province; Kabinburi District, Prachinburi Province; Lamphun District, Lamphun Province; and Mae Sot District, Tak Province. The company was formerly known as Saha Pathana Investment Company Limited. Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
